      • install

        public void install(String apiKey,
           String apiSecret,
           String stdid,
           String referrer,
           ApiCallback callback)
        Correlates to the /install endpoint of the Loopy API
        Parameters:
        referrer - The referrer that lead to the installation of the app.
        callback - A callback to handle the result.

      • open

        public void open(String apiKey,
        String apiSecret,
        String referrer,
        ApiCallback callback)
        Correlates to the /open endpoint of the Loopy API
        Parameters:
        referrer - The referrer that lead to the open of the app.
        callback - A callback to handle the result.

      • referrer

        public void referrer(String apiKey,
            String apiSecret,
            String referrer,
            ApiCallback callback)
        Correlates to the /referrer endpoint of the Loopy API
        Parameters:
        referrer - The referrer that lead to the installation of the app.
        callback - A callback to handle the result.

      • shortlink

        public void shortlink(String apiKey,
             String apiSecret,
             Item item,
             ApiCallback callback)
        Correlates to the /shortlink endpoint of the Loopy API
        Parameters:
        item - The item being shared.
        callback - A callback to handle the response.

      • share

        public void share(String apiKey,
         String apiSecret,
         String shortlink,
         String channel,
         ApiCallback callback)
        Correlates to the /share endpoint of the Loopy API
        Parameters:
        shortlink - The original shortlink generated from the /shortlink endpoint.
        channel - The channel through which the share is occurring (e.g. facebook, email etc)
        callback - A callback to handle the response.

      • log

        public void log(String apiKey,
       String apiSecret,
       Event event,
       ApiCallback callback)
        Correlates to the /log endpoint of the Loopy API
        Parameters:
        event - The event being logged.
        callback - A callback to handle the result.
